cast.name: 弗朗西斯科·维佐利 Francesco Vezzoli

introduction: Two years in the life of internationally acclaimed artist Francesco Vezzoli while preparing his exhibitions at some of the world’s most prestigious museums and institutions and for major art events: the MAXXI Museum in Rome, MoCA in Los Angeles, the Venice Architecture Biennale, Pitti Immagine in Florence, Doha Qatar Museum of Modern Art, MoMA PS1 in New York and Aurora Museum in Shanghai. Viewers are accompanied through each project from the initial idea through to its eventual exhibition in order to understand the artist’s creative process.
